Scraper in Python¶

Requirements¶

  • ## Urllib2 ( python 2.x ), Urllib (python 3)
  • ## BeautifulSoup (beautifulsoup4)
  • ## Requests
  • ## Pandas
  • ## Selenium
  • ## Sqlite3

How to install the package¶

Using pip¶

  • ### pip install beautifulsoup4
  • ### pip install requests
  • ### pip install pandas
In [1]:
import sys
if sys.version_info>(3,0):
    from urllib.request import urlopen
else:
    from urllib2 import urlopen
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import requests
In [2]:
#test packages
print (urlopen)
print (BeautifulSoup)
print (requests.__version__)

<function urlopen at 0x0000000005870978>
<class 'bs4.BeautifulSoup'>
2.18.4

urlopen¶

Open the URL url, which can be either a string or a Request object.¶

In [3]:
html = urlopen('http://www.nccu.edu.tw/')
content = html.read()
print (content)

  <script type="text/javascript">
  $("#open-orbit-login").on("change",function(){
    if($(this).is(":checked")){
      $("#user_user_id").focus();
    }
  })
  $(".login-body form").on("submit",function(){
    $(this).append("<input type='hidden' name='referer_url' value='http://www.nccu.edu.tw/'/>");
  })
  var I18n = {
    get locale(){ return "zh_tw"},
    get validLocales(){return ["zh_tw","en"]},
    set locale(v){return false},
    set validLocales(v){return false}
  };
  $.ajax({
    url : "pm_index.json",
    crossDomain : true,
    dataType : "json"
  }).done(function(data){
    var nccu = data.filter(function(x){if(x.SiteName == "古亭") return x})[0],
        dom = $("#pm-index-show"),
        textdom = $("#pm-index-text"),
        pm = parseFloat(nccu["PM2.5"]),
        color = 0,
        colorRange = ["#9cff9c","#31FF00","#31CF00","#FFFF00","#FFCF00","#FF9A00","#FF6464","#FF0000","#990000","#CE30FF"],
        notification = {
          "en" : ["Good", "Good", "Good", "Moderate", "Moderate", "Moderate", "Unhealthy", "Unhealthy", "Unhealthy", "Very Unhealthfy"],
          "zh_tw" : ["良好", "良好", "良好", "普通", "普通", "普通", "不良", "不良", "不良", "非常不良"]
        }
        indexrange = [[0,11], [12,23], [24, 35], [36, 41], [42, 47], [48, 53], [54, 58], [59, 64], [65, 70], [71, 1000]],
        current_notifications = notification[I18n.locale];
        for(i in indexrange){
          var x = indexrange[i];
          if(x[0] <= pm && x[1] >= pm){
            color = i;
          }
        }
    textdom.css("background-color",colorRange[color]);
    dom.text(pm);
    textdom.text(current_notifications[color]);
    dom.parent().removeClass("hide");
  })
  </script>

  fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
}(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));</script>

<div class="w-news news-widget-2" data-subpart-id="569f4884d7ac0a410c0019a0">
  <div class="w-news-left-col">
    <a href="%7B%7Bmore_url%7D%7D">
      <h2 class="topic_title">校園焦點</h2>
    </a>
    <div class="btn-group topic_note">
        <a class="w-news-category-toggle btn dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown" href="#">

          <span class="caret"></span>
        </a>

              <a href="/zh_tw/news/">全部類別</a>

            <li>
              <a href="/zh_tw/news/?category=%E4%BA%BA%E7%89%A9%E5%B0%88%E8%A8%AA-55845607">人物專訪</a>

            </li>
        
            <li>
              <a href="/zh_tw/news/?category=%E5%9C%8B%E9%9A%9B%E4%BA%A4%E6%B5%81-34569066">國際交流</a>
            </li>
        </ul>
    </div>

    <div class="feature">
      <ul class="feature-list list-unstyled" data-level="0" data-list="news">
        <div class="feature-img-wrap">
          <a class="feature-img-link" href="/zh_tw/news/%E6%94%BF%E5%A4%A7%E6%9D%B1%E4%BA%9E%E6%89%80%E5%96%9C%E6%85%B6%E6%88%90%E7%AB%8B%E7%AC%AC49%E5%91%A8%E5%B9%B4-96227328">
            <img class="feature-img" src="/uploads/news_bulletin/image/5a422626e78fe13eff008eea/mobile_mobile_covers.jpg" alt="Feature image">
          </a>
        </div>
        <div class="feature-content">
          <h4 class="feature-title">
            <a class="feature-link" href="/zh_tw/news/%E6%94%BF%E5%A4%A7%E6%9D%B1%E4%BA%9E%E6%89%80%E5%96%9C%E6%85%B6%E6%88%90%E7%AB%8B%E7%AC%AC49%E5%91%A8%E5%B9%B4-96227328">政大東亞所喜慶成立第49周年</a>
          </h4>
          <p class="feature-subtitle">慶祝成立第49周年，東亞所12月23日舉辦一系列所慶活動，邀請東亞所老、中、青三代校友回到母校，與在校同學學術交流、餐敘分享及運動會。東亞所49周年所慶由具學術氣氛的研究生論文發表會展開序幕，第一場次聚焦於中國對外關系，由東亞所在校生就東亞區域研究成果進行分享；第二場次討論主軸為中國內部國家與社會關係，發表人就中國各領域及面向進行議題探究與理論對話，會中邀請相關領域的專家學者擔任評論人，就學生們研究成果分享進行評析與回饋，討論氣氛相當熱烈。</p>
          <a class="feature-more" href="/zh_tw/news/%E6%94%BF%E5%A4%A7%E6%9D%B1%E4%BA%9E%E6%89%80%E5%96%9C%E6%85%B6%E6%88%90%E7%AB%8B%E7%AC%AC49%E5%91%A8%E5%B9%B4-96227328">Read more</a>
        </div>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="w-news-right-col">

    <div class="feature">
      <ul class="feature-list list-unstyled" data-level="0" data-list="news">
        <div class="feature-img-wrap">
          <a class="feature-img-link" href="/zh_tw/news/%E6%94%BF%E5%A4%A7%E6%9D%B1%E4%BA%9E%E6%89%80%E5%96%9C%E6%85%B6%E6%88%90%E7%AB%8B%E7%AC%AC49%E5%91%A8%E5%B9%B4-96227328">
            <img class="feature-img" src="/uploads/news_bulletin/image/5a422626e78fe13eff008eea/mobile_mobile_covers.jpg" alt="Feature image">
          </a>
        </div>
        <div class="feature-content">
          <h4 class="feature-title">
            <a class="feature-link" href="/zh_tw/news/%E6%94%BF%E5%A4%A7%E6%9D%B1%E4%BA%9E%E6%89%80%E5%96%9C%E6%85%B6%E6%88%90%E7%AB%8B%E7%AC%AC49%E5%91%A8%E5%B9%B4-96227328">政大東亞所喜慶成立第49周年</a>
          </h4>
          <p class="feature-subtitle">慶祝成立第49周年，東亞所12月23日舉辦一系列所慶活動，邀請東亞所老、中、青三代校友回到母校，與在校同學學術交流、餐敘分享及運動會。東亞所49周年所慶由具學術氣氛的研究生論文發表會展開序幕，第一場次聚焦於中國對外關系，由東亞所在校生就東亞區域研究成果進行分享；第二場次討論主軸為中國內部國家與社會關係，發表人就中國各領域及面向進行議題探究與理論對話，會中邀請相關領域的專家學者擔任評論人，就學生們研究成果分享進行評析與回饋，討論氣氛相當熱烈。</p>
          <a class="feature-more" href="/zh_tw/news/%E6%94%BF%E5%A4%A7%E6%9D%B1%E4%BA%9E%E6%89%80%E5%96%9C%E6%85%B6%E6%88%90%E7%AB%8B%E7%AC%AC49%E5%91%A8%E5%B9%B4-96227328">Read more</a>
        </div>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </div>

    </a>
     <div class="news-list-wrap">
        <ul class="news-list" data-level="1" data-list="news">
          <li class="news-list-content">
            <h4 class="news-list-title">
              <a class="news-list-link" href="/zh_tw/news/%E5%A2%A8%E7%88%BE%E6%9C%AC%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%9C%8B%E9%9A%9B%E7%A7%BB%E5%9C%B0%E6%95%99%E5%AD%B8%E6%96%BC%E6%94%BF%E5%A4%A7%E7%86%B1%E7%83%88%E9%96%8B%E8%B7%91-%E4%BF%83%E9%80%B2%E4%BA%9E%E5%A4%AA%E5%AD%B8%E7%94%9F%E4%BA%A4%E6%B5%81-50993210">墨爾本大學國際移地教學於政大熱烈開跑 促進亞太學生交流</a>
            </h4>
          </li>
        
          <li class="news-list-content">
            <h4 class="news-list-title">
              <a class="news-list-link" href="/zh_tw/news/%E6%94%BF%E5%A4%A7%E6%9D%B1%E5%8D%97%E4%BA%9E%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E4%B8%AD%E5%BF%83%E6%8E%A5%E4%BB%BBSEASIA%E7%A7%98%E6%9B%B8%E8%99%95-97225494">政大東南亞研究中心接任SEASIA秘書處</a>
            </h4>
          </li>
        
          <li class="news-list-content">
            <h4 class="news-list-title">
              <a class="news-list-link" href="/zh_tw/news/%E6%B3%95%E5%9C%8B%E6%A0%BC%E5%8B%92%E8%AB%BE%E6%9F%8F-%E9%98%BF%E7%88%BE%E5%8D%91%E6%96%AF%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E6%A0%A1%E9%95%B7%E4%BE%86%E8%A8%AA-%E5%88%86%E4%BA%AB%E6%A0%A1%E5%8B%99%E6%B2%BB%E7%90%86%E8%88%87%E8%82%B2%E6%89%8D%E8%B6%A8%E5%8B%A2%E5%89%8D%E6%99%AF-20302799">法國格勒諾柏-阿爾卑斯大學校長來訪  分享校務治理與育才趨勢前景</a>
            </h4>
          </li>
        
          <li class="news-list-content">
            <h4 class="news-list-title">
              <a class="news-list-link" href="/zh_tw/news/%E8%B7%A8%E5%9C%8B%E5%85%A9%E6%A0%A1-%E7%A4%BE%E5%8D%80%E9%83%A8%E8%90%BD%E7%B0%BD%E7%BD%B2%E5%82%99%E5%BF%98%E9%8C%84-%E6%B0%91%E6%97%8F%E5%AD%B8%E7%B3%BB%E6%B7%B1%E5%8C%96%E5%9C%8B%E9%9A%9B%E5%AD%B8%E8%A1%93%E4%BA%A4%E6%B5%81-35369823">跨國兩校、社區部落簽署備忘錄   民族學系深化國際學術交流</a>
            </h4>
          </li>
        </ul>

<script>
  $(document).ready(function() {
  //   $.ajax({
  //       "type" : "get",
  //       "dataType" : "html",
  //       "data" : {"sub_part_id" : $("#annoucement_link_widget").data("subpart-id")},
  //       "url" : "/zh_tw/xhr/announcement_link_widget/content"
  //   }).done(function(data){
  //       $("#annoucement_link_widget").html(data);
  //       bindHandlers();
  //   })
  bindHandlers();

    

  	// quick fix for this Tab when it's on mobile devices
  	var vw = $(window).width(),
  		$tab = $('.tab'),
  		$annc = $tab.find('.annc-content'),
  		$wlink = $tab.find('.wlink-content'),
  		height = $annc.outerHeight() + $wlink.outerHeight();

  	if (vw < 480) {
	  	$tab.height(height);
  	}

	
  });

  var bindHandlers = function(){
	 var quant = 5,
		$pagination = $('.pagination');

	var itemSelect = function(r, el) {
	  var range = (r * quant);
	  $(el).children('.list-item').hide();
	  for (var i = range - quant; i < range; i++) {
		$(el).children('.list-item').eq(i).show();
	  };
	}

	var pagination = function(q, m, el) {
	  if(q == 1 && m > 1) {
		$(el).children('.prev').css({'color': '#6C6C6C'});
		$(el).children('.next').css({'color': '#cc0033'});
	  } else if(q > 1 && q < m) {
		$(el).children('a').css({'color': '#cc0033'});
	  } else if(q == m && m > 1) {
		$(el).children('.prev').css({'color': '#cc0033'});
		$(el).children('.next').css({'color': '#6C6C6C'});
	  } else if(m == 1) {
		$(el).children('.next').css({'color': '#6C6C6C'});
	  }
	}
	$pagination.each(function(index, el) {
	  var max = Math.ceil($(el).next('.list').children('.list-item').length / 5),
		  quant = $(el).data('quant')
	  pagination(quant, max, $(el));
	});

	$('.list').each(function(index, el) {
	  itemSelect(1, el);
	});
	$('.tab-item').eq(0).addClass('active');
	$('.tab-body').eq(0).addClass('active');
	$('.tab-item').on('click', function(e) {
	  $('.tab-item').removeClass('active').next('.tab-body').removeClass('active');
	  $(this).addClass('active').next('.tab-body').addClass('active');
	  e.preventDefault();
	});
	$('.pagination').on('click', '.prev, .next', function(event) {
	  var tragetClass = $(this).attr('class'),
		  max = Math.ceil($(this).closest('.pagination').next('.list').children('.list-item').length / 5),
		  quant = $(this).closest('.pagination').data('quant'),
		  $pagination = $(this).closest('.pagination'),
		  $el = $(this).closest('.pagination').next('.list');
	  switch(tragetClass) {
		case 'next':
		  quant += 1;
		  quant > max ? quant = max : null;
		  break;
		case 'prev':
		  quant -= 1;
		  quant < 1 ? quant = 1 : null;
		  break;
	  }
	  $(this).closest('.pagination').data('quant', quant);
	  pagination(quant, max, $pagination);
	  itemSelect(quant, $el);
	  event.preventDefault();
	});
  }
</script>

</div>
                 </div>
               </div>
               <div class="right">
                 <div class="inner">
                    <div class="extra" data-pp="7">
<div class="e-calendar"> </div>

<style type="text/css">#event_calendar-2 {

    margin: 0;

    padding: 0;

    list-style: none;

}



.e-calendar {

    background: none repeat scroll 0 0 #fff;

    border-radius: 4px;

    -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 5px #d8d8d8;

    -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 5px #d8d8d8;

    box-shadow: 0 0 5px #d8d8d8;

    margin: 0;

    padding: 0;

    width: 100%;

}



.e-calendar .events_inner {

    position: relative;

    padding: 10px 12px;

}



.e-calendar .events_inner>p {

    margin: 0;

}



.e-calendar .event_title {

    border-bottom: 1px solid #b2b2b2;

    margin: 0;

    padding: 5px 0 2px;

}



.e-calendar li+li {

    border-top: 1px solid #ccc;

}



.e-calendar li {

    letter-spacing: 0.05em;

    padding: 1em 0.5em;

}



.e-calendar .event_title a {

    color: #888;

    font-size: 18px;

    line-height: 36px;

    font-weight: normal;

    padding-left: 10px;

}



.e-calendar li a {

    display: block;

    margin-left: 3.5em;

    line-height: 1.4em;

    width: 85%;

    white-space: nowrap;

    overflow: hidden;

    text-overflow: ellipsis;

    color: #000;

    font-family: '新細明體', '細明體';

}



.e-calendar .event_date {

    font-family: Arial;

    color: #cc0033;

    float: left;

    font-size: 1.25em;

    line-height: 1em;

    text-align: center;

}



.e-calendar .links {

    display: block;

    position: absolute;

    outline: medium none;

    cursor: pointer;

    width: 15px;

    height: 15px;

    border: 1px solid #dcdcdc;

    top: 15px;

    border-radius: 3px;

    font-family: 'entypo';

    text-align: center;

    color: #cc0033;

}



.e-calendar .links:hover {

  color: #a3012b !important;

}



.e-calendar .links.disabled {

    border-color: transparent;

    color: #ccc;

}



.e-calendar .links.links_prev {

    right: 26px;

}



.e-calendar .links.links_next {

    right: 10px;

}



.e-calendar .links:before {

    position: absolute;

    top: 0;

    right: 0;

    bottom: 0;

    left: 0;

    line-height: 15px;

}



.e-calendar .links.links_prev:before {

    content: "\e0d1";

}



.e-calendar .links.links_next:before {

    content: "\e0d4";

}



.e-calendar .event_info {

    color: #7B7B7B;

    display: block;

    margin-left: 3.5em;

}

</style>

<script>

(function($) {

    var getXmlFeedForCalendar = function() {

        var wrap = $("<div class='events_inner'><h2 class='h2 event_title'><span><a href='http://events.nccu.edu.tw/' target='_blank'><span>活動行事曆</span></a></span></h2><p><a class='links links_prev disabled' href=''>&nbsp;</a><a class='links links_next disabled' href=''>&nbsp;</a></p><ul id='event_calendar-2'></ul></div>"),

            template = "<li><div class='event_date'><div class='mon'></div><div class='day'>/06</div></div><a class='event_name' href=''target='_blank'></a><div class='event_info'></div></li>",

            month = ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun', 'Jul', 'Aug', 'Sep', 'Oct', 'Nov', 'Dec'];



        $('.e-calendar')

            .text("")

            .append(wrap);



        $.ajax({

            "url": "/nccu_calendar_zh_tw.xml",

            "dataType": "xml",

            "type": "get"

        }).done(function(data) {

            xmldoc = $(data);

            xmldoc.find("entry").each(function(i, entry) {

                var el = $(entry),

                    li = $(template),

                    summary_text = el.find("summary").text(),

                    indexA = summary_text.indexOf("-"),

                    indexB = summary_text.indexOf(" "),

                    indexC = summary_text.indexOf("/"),

                    startDate_text = null,

                    startMon_text = null,

                    endDate_text = null,

                    time_text = null;



                summary_text = jQuery.trim(summary_text);



                if (summary_text.length == 31) {

                    startDate_text = summary_text.slice(0, indexA);

                    startMon_text = startDate_text.slice((indexC + 1), (indexC + 3));

                    startDay_text = startDate_text.slice(7);

                    endDate_text = summary_text.slice((indexA + 1), indexB);

                    time_text = summary_text.slice((indexB + 1));

                } else {

                    startDate_text = summary_text.slice(0, indexB);

                    startMon_text = startDate_text.slice((indexC + 1), (indexC + 3));

                    startDay_text = startDate_text.slice(7);

                    endDate_text = '';

                    time_text = summary_text.slice((indexB + 1));

                }

                if (startMon_text.slice(0, 1) == '0') {

                    startMon_text = month[startMon_text.slice(1) - 1];

                } else {

                    startMon_text = month[startMon_text - 1];

                }



                li.find("a").text(el.find("title").text()).attr("href", el.find("link").attr("href"));

                li.find(".mon").text(startMon_text);

                li.find(".day").text(startDay_text);

                li.find(".event_info").text("時間：" + time_text);

                $("#event_calendar-2").append(li);

            })

            bindHandler();

        })

        var $next = $('.e-calendar .links_next'),

            $prev = $('.e-calendar .links_prev');

        var bindHandler = function() {

            var page_number = 1,

                total_pages = Math.ceil($("#event_calendar-2 li").length / 3);

            showLis(page_number, total_pages);

            $next.on("click", function() {

                if (page_number < total_pages) {

                    page_number++;

                    showLis(page_number, total_pages);

                }

                return false;

            });

            $prev.on("click", function() {

                if (page_number > 1) {

                    page_number--;

                    showLis(page_number, total_pages);

                }

                return false;

            });

        }

        var showLis = function(page_number, total_pages) {

            var $ul = $("#event_calendar-2"),

                start = (page_number - 1) * 3,

                end = (page_number * 3) - 1;

            $ul.find("li").hide();

            for (var i = start; i <= end; i++) {

                $ul.find("li").eq(i).show();

            }

            if (page_number == 1 && total_pages > 1) {

                $prev.addClass("disabled");

                $next.removeClass("disabled");

            } else if (page_number > 1 && page_number < total_pages) {

                $prev.removeClass("disabled");

                $next.removeClass("disabled");

            } else if (page_number == total_pages) {

                $next.addClass("disabled");

            }

        }

    }

    $(document).ready(function($) {

        getXmlFeedForCalendar();

    });

}(jQuery));

</script>
</div>
                 </div>
               </div>
             </div>
             <div class="secondary">
                <div class="left">
                  <div class="inner banner">
                    <div class="page_content" data-pp="5">

<div class="widget-adBanner widget2" data-subpart-id="54f32b8975627513bda9d600">
  <div class="cycle-slideshow widget-adBanner-content" data-list="images" data-level="0" data-cycle-slides=".slide-img" data-overlay=".widget-adBanner-overlay .caption" data-pager=".widget-adBanner-overlay2 .home" data-pager-template="&lt;li&gt;&lt;i class='fa fa-circle-o'&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/li&gt;" data-pager-active-class="active" data-cycle-log="false">
    <div class="active slide-img" data-link="https://moltke.nccu.edu.tw/Registration/registration.do?action=conferenceInfo&amp;conferenceID=X13698" data-cycle-title="" data-cycle-desc="" data-overlay-template="&lt;h2&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;{{desc}}" data-target="">
        <img src="/uploads/ad_image/file/5a3c676be78fe12b9f00f505/UW_banner.jpg" alt="" title="">
    </div>
  
    <div class=" slide-img" data-link="http://www.tjtesol.org/index.php" data-cycle-title="" data-cycle-desc="" data-overlay-template="&lt;h2&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;{{desc}}" data-target="">
        <img src="/uploads/ad_image/file/5a3b5c50e78fe12bb100ed62/%E8%8B%B1%E6%96%87%E6%9C%9F%E5%88%8ABanner_OK-01.jpg" alt="" title="">
    </div>
  
    <div class=" slide-img" data-link="" data-cycle-title="" data-cycle-desc="" data-overlay-template="&lt;h2&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;{{desc}}" data-target="">
        <img src="/uploads/ad_image/file/5a2ded8ae78fe12ba200b01f/%E6%94%BF%E5%A4%A7%E5%82%B3%E6%92%AD%E5%AD%B8%E9%99%A2%E5%8A%87%E5%A0%B4_%E6%8B%9B%E6%96%B0%E6%A9%AB%E5%B9%85.jpg" alt="" title="">
    </div>
  
    <div class=" slide-img" data-link="http://learning.nccu.edu.tw/" data-cycle-title="" data-cycle-desc="" data-overlay-template="&lt;h2&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;{{desc}}" data-target="">
        <img src="/uploads/ad_image/file/5a249798e78fe12eeb00836a/%E5%B1%B1%E6%B0%B4%E8%AC%9B%E5%A0%82_%E6%94%BF%E5%A4%A7%E6%95%99%E5%AD%B8%E6%9C%88_%E9%A6%96%E9%A0%81%E5%AE%A3%E5%82%B3banner.jpg" alt="" title="">
    </div>
  
    <div class=" slide-img" data-link="https://www.facebook.com/nccu.writer/" data-cycle-title="" data-cycle-desc="" data-overlay-template="&lt;h2&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;{{desc}}" data-target="">
        <img src="/uploads/ad_image/file/59fae3d5e78fe137b6006da6/banner-2-0112.jpg" alt="" title="">

    <div class=" slide-img" data-link="http://www.history.nccu.edu.tw/news/news.php?Sn=810" data-cycle-title="" data-cycle-desc="" data-overlay-template="&lt;h2&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;{{desc}}" data-target="">

    </div>
  </div>
  <div class="widget-adBanner-overlay2">
    <ul class="navigation home"></ul>
  </div>
</div>

</div>
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div class="right">
                  <div class="inner">
                    <div class="page_content" data-pp="6">

緊急事件通聯窗口（24小時）：軍訓室（校安中心）0919099119（校內分機 66119）、駐警隊02-29387129（校內分機66110）</p>

In [4]:
if sys.version_info>(3,0):
    title = content.decode().split('<title>')[1].split('</title')[0]
else:
    title = content.split('<title>')[1].split('</title')[0]
print (title)

國立政治大學

BeautifulSoup¶

The term Beautiful Soup originates with Lewis Carroll's Alice's Adventures in Wonderland and a song Beautiful Soup¶

Beautiful Soup is a Python library for pulling data out of HTML and XML files¶

In [5]:
soup = BeautifulSoup(content)
print (soup.prettify())

  <script type="text/javascript">
   $("#open-orbit-login").on("change",function(){
    if($(this).is(":checked")){
      $("#user_user_id").focus();
    }
  })
  $(".login-body form").on("submit",function(){
    $(this).append("<input type='hidden' name='referer_url' value='http://www.nccu.edu.tw/'/>");
  })
  var I18n = {
    get locale(){ return "zh_tw"},
    get validLocales(){return ["zh_tw","en"]},
    set locale(v){return false},
    set validLocales(v){return false}
  };
  $.ajax({
    url : "pm_index.json",
    crossDomain : true,
    dataType : "json"
  }).done(function(data){
    var nccu = data.filter(function(x){if(x.SiteName == "古亭") return x})[0],
        dom = $("#pm-index-show"),
        textdom = $("#pm-index-text"),
        pm = parseFloat(nccu["PM2.5"]),
        color = 0,
        colorRange = ["#9cff9c","#31FF00","#31CF00","#FFFF00","#FFCF00","#FF9A00","#FF6464","#FF0000","#990000","#CE30FF"],
        notification = {
          "en" : ["Good", "Good", "Good", "Moderate", "Moderate", "Moderate", "Unhealthy", "Unhealthy", "Unhealthy", "Very Unhealthfy"],
          "zh_tw" : ["良好", "良好", "良好", "普通", "普通", "普通", "不良", "不良", "不良", "非常不良"]
        }
        indexrange = [[0,11], [12,23], [24, 35], [36, 41], [42, 47], [48, 53], [54, 58], [59, 64], [65, 70], [71, 1000]],
        current_notifications = notification[I18n.locale];
        for(i in indexrange){
          var x = indexrange[i];
          if(x[0] <= pm && x[1] >= pm){
            color = i;
          }
        }
    textdom.css("background-color",colorRange[color]);
    dom.text(pm);
    textdom.text(current_notifications[color]);
    dom.parent().removeClass("hide");
  })
  </script>

}(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));

           <div class=" slide-img" data-cycle-desc="" data-cycle-overlay-template="&lt;h2 class='caption-title'&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;&lt;p class='caption-subtitle'&gt;{{desc}}&lt;/p&gt;&lt;a class='caption-link' href='http://www.nccu.edu.tw/zh_tw/news/-2017%E6%A0%A1%E5%9C%92%E9%A6%AC%E6%8B%89%E6%9D%BE-%E5%B9%B4%E5%83%8514%E6%AD%B2%E9%99%B3%E5%93%81%E4%BB%BB%E4%B8%80%E9%A6%AC%E7%95%B6%E5%85%88-%E5%A5%B3%E5%AD%90%E7%B5%84%E8%A8%B1%E8%8C%B5%E8%8C%B5%E5%B0%87%E5%86%A0%E8%BB%8D%E7%95%99%E5%9C%A8%E6%94%BF%E5%A4%A7-81238617'&gt;Read more&lt;/a&gt;" data-cycle-title="" data-link="http://www.nccu.edu.tw/zh_tw/news/-2017%E6%A0%A1%E5%9C%92%E9%A6%AC%E6%8B%89%E6%9D%BE-%E5%B9%B4%E5%83%8514%E6%AD%B2%E9%99%B3%E5%93%81%E4%BB%BB%E4%B8%80%E9%A6%AC%E7%95%B6%E5%85%88-%E5%A5%B3%E5%AD%90%E7%B5%84%E8%A8%B1%E8%8C%B5%E8%8C%B5%E5%B0%87%E5%86%A0%E8%BB%8D%E7%95%99%E5%9C%A8%E6%94%BF%E5%A4%A7-81238617" data-target="">
            <img alt="" src="/uploads/ad_image/file/5a252dbde78fe12f30008543/182488.jpg" title=""/>
           </div>

         <div class="news">
          <div class="main-col main-col--ch page_content" data-pp="2">
           <div class="w-news news-widget-2" data-subpart-id="569f4884d7ac0a410c0019a0">
            <div class="w-news-left-col">
             <a href="%7B%7Bmore_url%7D%7D">
              <h2 class="topic_title">
               校園焦點
              </h2>
             </a>
             <div class="btn-group topic_note">
              <a class="w-news-category-toggle btn dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown" href="#">
               更多新聞+
               <span class="caret">
               </span>
              </a>
              <ul class="dropdown-menu" data-level="0" data-list="categories">
               <li>
                <a href="/zh_tw/news/">
                 全部類別
                </a>
               </li>
               <li>
                <a href="/zh_tw/news/?category=%E6%A0%A1%E5%8B%99%E8%A1%8C%E6%94%BF-38219909">
                 校務行政
                </a>
               </li>
               <li>
                <a href="/zh_tw/news/?category=%E4%BA%BA%E7%89%A9%E5%B0%88%E8%A8%AA-55845607">
                 人物專訪
                </a>
               </li>
               <li>
                <a href="/zh_tw/news/?category=%E6%A0%A1%E5%9C%92%E7%94%9F%E6%B4%BB-31687832">
                 校園生活
                </a>
               </li>
               <li>
                <a href="/zh_tw/news/?category=%E5%AD%B8%E8%A1%93%E5%8B%95%E6%85%8B-21942355">
                 學術動態
                </a>
               </li>
               <li>
                <a href="/zh_tw/news/?category=%E6%A0%A1%E5%8F%8B%E5%8B%95%E6%85%8B-65160235">
                 校友動態
                </a>
               </li>
               <li>
                <a href="/zh_tw/news/?category=%E6%A0%A1%E5%8B%99%E8%AA%AA%E6%98%8E-11847993">
                 校務說明
                </a>
               </li>
               <li>
                <a href="/zh_tw/news/?category=%E5%9C%8B%E9%9A%9B%E4%BA%A4%E6%B5%81-34569066">
                 國際交流
                </a>
               </li>
              </ul>
             </div>
             <div class="feature">
              <ul class="feature-list list-unstyled" data-level="0" data-list="news">
               <div class="feature-img-wrap">
                <a class="feature-img-link" href="/zh_tw/news/%E6%94%BF%E5%A4%A7%E6%9D%B1%E4%BA%9E%E6%89%80%E5%96%9C%E6%85%B6%E6%88%90%E7%AB%8B%E7%AC%AC49%E5%91%A8%E5%B9%B4-96227328">
                 <img alt="Feature image" class="feature-img" src="/uploads/news_bulletin/image/5a422626e78fe13eff008eea/mobile_mobile_covers.jpg"/>
                </a>
               </div>
               <div class="feature-content">
                <h4 class="feature-title">
                 <a class="feature-link" href="/zh_tw/news/%E6%94%BF%E5%A4%A7%E6%9D%B1%E4%BA%9E%E6%89%80%E5%96%9C%E6%85%B6%E6%88%90%E7%AB%8B%E7%AC%AC49%E5%91%A8%E5%B9%B4-96227328">
                  政大東亞所喜慶成立第49周年
                 </a>
                </h4>
                <p class="feature-subtitle">
                 慶祝成立第49周年，東亞所12月23日舉辦一系列所慶活動，邀請東亞所老、中、青三代校友回到母校，與在校同學學術交流、餐敘分享及運動會。東亞所49周年所慶由具學術氣氛的研究生論文發表會展開序幕，第一場次聚焦於中國對外關系，由東亞所在校生就東亞區域研究成果進行分享；第二場次討論主軸為中國內部國家與社會關係，發表人就中國各領域及面向進行議題探究與理論對話，會中邀請相關領域的專家學者擔任評論人，就學生們研究成果分享進行評析與回饋，討論氣氛相當熱烈。
                </p>
                <a class="feature-more" href="/zh_tw/news/%E6%94%BF%E5%A4%A7%E6%9D%B1%E4%BA%9E%E6%89%80%E5%96%9C%E6%85%B6%E6%88%90%E7%AB%8B%E7%AC%AC49%E5%91%A8%E5%B9%B4-96227328">
                 Read more
                </a>
               </div>
              </ul>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="w-news-right-col">
             <div class="categories" data-level="0" data-list="categorized_news">
              <a href="/zh_tw/news/?category=%E6%A0%A1%E5%9C%92%E7%94%9F%E6%B4%BB-31687832">

                   EMBA冬歡音樂會 邀鎮海國中師生共襄盛舉
                  </a>
                 </h4>
                </li>

                   馬來西亞青年運動組織蒞校參訪 與服務性社團交流志工經驗
                  </a>
                 </h4>
                </li>
                <li class="news-list-content">
                 <h4 class="news-list-title">
                  <a class="news-list-link" href="/zh_tw/news/-%E6%96%B0%E8%A1%80%E4%BE%86%E6%BD%AE-%E6%88%91%E6%98%AF%E7%86%B1%E8%A1%80%E5%B0%8F%E8%A7%80%E9%9F%B3-%E9%A0%86%E5%88%A9%E8%90%BD%E5%B9%95-%E6%8C%87%E5%8D%97%E6%9C%8D%E5%8B%99%E5%9C%9812%E6%9C%88%E6%8D%90%E8%A1%80%E6%B4%BB%E5%8B%95-83264459">
                   「新血來潮：我是熱血小觀音」順利落幕 指南服務團12月捐血活動
                  </a>
                 </h4>
                </li>
               </ul>
              </div>

                </a>
               </div>
               <div class="feature-content">
                <h4 class="feature-title">
                 <a class="feature-link" href="/zh_tw/news/%E6%94%BF%E5%A4%A7%E6%9D%B1%E4%BA%9E%E6%89%80%E5%96%9C%E6%85%B6%E6%88%90%E7%AB%8B%E7%AC%AC49%E5%91%A8%E5%B9%B4-96227328">
                  政大東亞所喜慶成立第49周年
                 </a>
                </h4>
                <p class="feature-subtitle">
                 慶祝成立第49周年，東亞所12月23日舉辦一系列所慶活動，邀請東亞所老、中、青三代校友回到母校，與在校同學學術交流、餐敘分享及運動會。東亞所49周年所慶由具學術氣氛的研究生論文發表會展開序幕，第一場次聚焦於中國對外關系，由東亞所在校生就東亞區域研究成果進行分享；第二場次討論主軸為中國內部國家與社會關係，發表人就中國各領域及面向進行議題探究與理論對話，會中邀請相關領域的專家學者擔任評論人，就學生們研究成果分享進行評析與回饋，討論氣氛相當熱烈。
                </p>
                <a class="feature-more" href="/zh_tw/news/%E6%94%BF%E5%A4%A7%E6%9D%B1%E4%BA%9E%E6%89%80%E5%96%9C%E6%85%B6%E6%88%90%E7%AB%8B%E7%AC%AC49%E5%91%A8%E5%B9%B4-96227328">
                 Read more
                </a>
               </div>
              </ul>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="w-news-right-col">

                 <div class="wlink-content">
                  <h3 class="wlink-heading">
                   相關連結
                  </h3>
                  <div class="pagination" data-quant="1">
                   <a class="prev" href="%7B%7Bwlink-prev%7D%7D" rel="prev">
                    {{Prev}}
                   </a>
                   <a class="next" href="%7B%7Bwlink-next%7D%7D" rel="next">
                    {{Next}}
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <ul class="list" data-level="1" data-list="links">
                   <li class="list-item">
                    <a href="http://wa.nccu.edu.tw/QryTor/" target="_blank">
                     全校課程查詢
                    </a>
                   </li>
                  </ul>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <script>
              $(document).ready(function() {
  //   $.ajax({
  //       "type" : "get",
  //       "dataType" : "html",
  //       "data" : {"sub_part_id" : $("#annoucement_link_widget").data("subpart-id")},
  //       "url" : "/zh_tw/xhr/announcement_link_widget/content"
  //   }).done(function(data){
  //       $("#annoucement_link_widget").html(data);
  //       bindHandlers();
  //   })
  bindHandlers();

    

  	// quick fix for this Tab when it's on mobile devices
  	var vw = $(window).width(),
  		$tab = $('.tab'),
  		$annc = $tab.find('.annc-content'),
  		$wlink = $tab.find('.wlink-content'),
  		height = $annc.outerHeight() + $wlink.outerHeight();

  	if (vw < 480) {
	  	$tab.height(height);
  	}

	
  });

  var bindHandlers = function(){
	 var quant = 5,
		$pagination = $('.pagination');

	var itemSelect = function(r, el) {
	  var range = (r * quant);
	  $(el).children('.list-item').hide();
	  for (var i = range - quant; i < range; i++) {
		$(el).children('.list-item').eq(i).show();
	  };
	}

	var pagination = function(q, m, el) {
	  if(q == 1 && m > 1) {
		$(el).children('.prev').css({'color': '#6C6C6C'});
		$(el).children('.next').css({'color': '#cc0033'});
	  } else if(q > 1 && q < m) {
		$(el).children('a').css({'color': '#cc0033'});
	  } else if(q == m && m > 1) {
		$(el).children('.prev').css({'color': '#cc0033'});
		$(el).children('.next').css({'color': '#6C6C6C'});
	  } else if(m == 1) {
		$(el).children('.next').css({'color': '#6C6C6C'});
	  }
	}
	$pagination.each(function(index, el) {
	  var max = Math.ceil($(el).next('.list').children('.list-item').length / 5),
		  quant = $(el).data('quant')
	  pagination(quant, max, $(el));
	});

	$('.list').each(function(index, el) {
	  itemSelect(1, el);
	});
	$('.tab-item').eq(0).addClass('active');
	$('.tab-body').eq(0).addClass('active');
	$('.tab-item').on('click', function(e) {
	  $('.tab-item').removeClass('active').next('.tab-body').removeClass('active');
	  $(this).addClass('active').next('.tab-body').addClass('active');
	  e.preventDefault();
	});
	$('.pagination').on('click', '.prev, .next', function(event) {
	  var tragetClass = $(this).attr('class'),
		  max = Math.ceil($(this).closest('.pagination').next('.list').children('.list-item').length / 5),
		  quant = $(this).closest('.pagination').data('quant'),
		  $pagination = $(this).closest('.pagination'),
		  $el = $(this).closest('.pagination').next('.list');
	  switch(tragetClass) {
		case 'next':
		  quant += 1;
		  quant > max ? quant = max : null;
		  break;
		case 'prev':
		  quant -= 1;
		  quant < 1 ? quant = 1 : null;
		  break;
	  }
	  $(this).closest('.pagination').data('quant', quant);
	  pagination(quant, max, $pagination);
	  itemSelect(quant, $el);
	  event.preventDefault();
	});
  }
             </script>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="right">
           <div class="inner">
            <div class="extra" data-pp="7">
             <div class="e-calendar">
             </div>
             <style type="text/css">
              #event_calendar-2 {

    margin: 0;

    padding: 0;

    list-style: none;

}



.e-calendar {

    background: none repeat scroll 0 0 #fff;

    border-radius: 4px;

    -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 5px #d8d8d8;

    -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 5px #d8d8d8;

    box-shadow: 0 0 5px #d8d8d8;

    margin: 0;

    padding: 0;

    width: 100%;

}



.e-calendar .events_inner {

    position: relative;

    padding: 10px 12px;

}



.e-calendar .events_inner>p {

    margin: 0;

}



.e-calendar .event_title {

    border-bottom: 1px solid #b2b2b2;

    margin: 0;

    padding: 5px 0 2px;

}



.e-calendar li+li {

    border-top: 1px solid #ccc;

}



.e-calendar li {

    letter-spacing: 0.05em;

    padding: 1em 0.5em;

}



.e-calendar .event_title a {

    color: #888;

    font-size: 18px;

    line-height: 36px;

    font-weight: normal;

    padding-left: 10px;

}



.e-calendar li a {

    display: block;

    margin-left: 3.5em;

    line-height: 1.4em;

    width: 85%;

    white-space: nowrap;

    overflow: hidden;

    text-overflow: ellipsis;

    color: #000;

    font-family: '新細明體', '細明體';

}



.e-calendar .event_date {

    font-family: Arial;

    color: #cc0033;

    float: left;

    font-size: 1.25em;

    line-height: 1em;

    text-align: center;

}



.e-calendar .links {

    display: block;

    position: absolute;

    outline: medium none;

    cursor: pointer;

    width: 15px;

    height: 15px;

    border: 1px solid #dcdcdc;

    top: 15px;

    border-radius: 3px;

    font-family: 'entypo';

    text-align: center;

    color: #cc0033;

}



.e-calendar .links:hover {

  color: #a3012b !important;

}



.e-calendar .links.disabled {

    border-color: transparent;

    color: #ccc;

}



.e-calendar .links.links_prev {

    right: 26px;

}



.e-calendar .links.links_next {

    right: 10px;

}



.e-calendar .links:before {

    position: absolute;

    top: 0;

    right: 0;

    bottom: 0;

    left: 0;

    line-height: 15px;

}



.e-calendar .links.links_prev:before {

    content: "\e0d1";

}



.e-calendar .links.links_next:before {

    content: "\e0d4";

}



.e-calendar .event_info {

    color: #7B7B7B;

    display: block;

    margin-left: 3.5em;

}
             </style>
             <script>
              (function($) {

    var getXmlFeedForCalendar = function() {

        var wrap = $("<div class='events_inner'><h2 class='h2 event_title'><span><a href='http://events.nccu.edu.tw/' target='_blank'><span>活動行事曆</span></a></span></h2><p><a class='links links_prev disabled' href=''>&nbsp;</a><a class='links links_next disabled' href=''>&nbsp;</a></p><ul id='event_calendar-2'></ul></div>"),

            template = "<li><div class='event_date'><div class='mon'></div><div class='day'>/06</div></div><a class='event_name' href=''target='_blank'></a><div class='event_info'></div></li>",

            month = ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun', 'Jul', 'Aug', 'Sep', 'Oct', 'Nov', 'Dec'];



        $('.e-calendar')

            .text("")

            .append(wrap);



        $.ajax({

            "url": "/nccu_calendar_zh_tw.xml",

            "dataType": "xml",

            "type": "get"

        }).done(function(data) {

            xmldoc = $(data);

            xmldoc.find("entry").each(function(i, entry) {

                var el = $(entry),

                    li = $(template),

                    summary_text = el.find("summary").text(),

                    indexA = summary_text.indexOf("-"),

                    indexB = summary_text.indexOf(" "),

                    indexC = summary_text.indexOf("/"),

                    startDate_text = null,

                    startMon_text = null,

                    endDate_text = null,

                    time_text = null;



                summary_text = jQuery.trim(summary_text);



                if (summary_text.length == 31) {

                    startDate_text = summary_text.slice(0, indexA);

                    startMon_text = startDate_text.slice((indexC + 1), (indexC + 3));

                    startDay_text = startDate_text.slice(7);

                    endDate_text = summary_text.slice((indexA + 1), indexB);

                    time_text = summary_text.slice((indexB + 1));

                } else {

                    startDate_text = summary_text.slice(0, indexB);

                    startMon_text = startDate_text.slice((indexC + 1), (indexC + 3));

                    startDay_text = startDate_text.slice(7);

                    endDate_text = '';

                    time_text = summary_text.slice((indexB + 1));

                }

                if (startMon_text.slice(0, 1) == '0') {

                    startMon_text = month[startMon_text.slice(1) - 1];

                } else {

                    startMon_text = month[startMon_text - 1];

                }



                li.find("a").text(el.find("title").text()).attr("href", el.find("link").attr("href"));

                li.find(".mon").text(startMon_text);

                li.find(".day").text(startDay_text);

                li.find(".event_info").text("時間：" + time_text);

                $("#event_calendar-2").append(li);

            })

            bindHandler();

        })

        var $next = $('.e-calendar .links_next'),

            $prev = $('.e-calendar .links_prev');

        var bindHandler = function() {

            var page_number = 1,

                total_pages = Math.ceil($("#event_calendar-2 li").length / 3);

            showLis(page_number, total_pages);

            $next.on("click", function() {

                if (page_number < total_pages) {

                    page_number++;

                    showLis(page_number, total_pages);

                }

                return false;

            });

            $prev.on("click", function() {

                if (page_number > 1) {

                    page_number--;

                    showLis(page_number, total_pages);

                }

                return false;

            });

        }

        var showLis = function(page_number, total_pages) {

            var $ul = $("#event_calendar-2"),

                start = (page_number - 1) * 3,

                end = (page_number * 3) - 1;

            $ul.find("li").hide();

            for (var i = start; i <= end; i++) {

                $ul.find("li").eq(i).show();

            }

            if (page_number == 1 && total_pages > 1) {

                $prev.addClass("disabled");

                $next.removeClass("disabled");

            } else if (page_number > 1 && page_number < total_pages) {

                $prev.removeClass("disabled");

                $next.removeClass("disabled");

            } else if (page_number == total_pages) {

                $next.addClass("disabled");

            }

        }

    }

    $(document).ready(function($) {

        getXmlFeedForCalendar();

    });

}(jQuery));
             </script>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>

C:\Users\kevinlin\Anaconda2\lib\site-packages\bs4\__init__.py:181: UserWarning: No parser was explicitly specified, so I'm using the best available HTML parser for this system ("lxml"). This usually isn't a problem, but if you run this code on another system, or in a different virtual environment, it may use a different parser and behave differently.

The code that caused this warning is on line 174 of the file C:\Users\kevinlin\Anaconda2\lib\runpy.py. To get rid of this warning, change code that looks like this:

 BeautifulSoup(YOUR_MARKUP})

to this:

 BeautifulSoup(YOUR_MARKUP, "lxml")

  markup_type=markup_type))

print (soup.title.string)
print (soup.title.get_text())
print (soup.title.parent.name)
print (soup.title.parent.parent.name)
print (soup.title.child)

find( ) : find the first element¶

find_all( ) : find all element¶

In [7]:
about_nccu = soup.find_all('ul',{'class':'page_menu level_2'})[0]
output= about_nccu.get_text()
print (about_nccu)
print (output)

[<a data-menu-link="true" href="http://info.nccu.edu.tw/epaper/" target="_blank">\u653f\u5927\u6821\u8a0a</a>, <a data-menu-link="true" href="http://donation.nccu.edu.tw" target="_blank">\u6350\u653f</a>, <a data-menu-link="true" href="/zh_tw/about/traffic" target="_self">\u4ea4\u901a\u8cc7\u8a0a</a>, <a data-menu-link="true" href="/zh_tw/about/map" target="_self">\u6821\u5712\u5730\u5716</a>, <a data-menu-link="true" href="/zh_tw/about/nccucalendar" target="_self">\u5e74\u5ea6\u884c\u4e8b\u66c6</a>, <a data-menu-link="true" href="/zh_tw/about/video" target="_self">\u5f71\u97f3\u653f\u5927</a>]

[<a data-menu-link="true" href="http://info.nccu.edu.tw/epaper/" target="_blank">\u653f\u5927\u6821\u8a0a</a>, <a data-menu-link="true" href="http://donation.nccu.edu.tw" target="_blank">\u6350\u653f</a>, <a data-menu-link="true" href="/zh_tw/about/traffic" target="_self">\u4ea4\u901a\u8cc7\u8a0a</a>, <a data-menu-link="true" href="/zh_tw/about/map" target="_self">\u6821\u5712\u5730\u5716</a>, <a data-menu-link="true" href="/zh_tw/about/nccucalendar" target="_self">\u5e74\u5ea6\u884c\u4e8b\u66c6</a>, <a data-menu-link="true" href="/zh_tw/about/video" target="_self">\u5f71\u97f3\u653f\u5927</a>]

政大校訊

HTTP vs. HTTPS¶

In [10]:
if sys.version_info>(3,0):
    from urllib.error import HTTPError
else:
    from urllib2 import HTTPError

try:
    ptt = urlopen('https://www.ptt.cc/bbs/movie/M.1513345790.A.174.html')
except HTTPError as e:
    print (e)

HTTP Error 403: Forbidden

User-agent¶

Mozilla/5.0¶

python urllib/x.x.x¶

In [11]:
if sys.version_info>(3,0):
    from urllib.request import Request
else:
    from urllib2 import Request

ptt = urlopen(Request('https://www.ptt.cc/bbs/movie/M.1513345790.A.174.html' ,headers={'User-Agent' : "Mozilla/5.0"}))
html = ptt.read()
print (html)

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
	<head>
		<meta charset="utf-8">
		

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

<div id="main-container">
    <div id="main-content" class="bbs-screen bbs-content"><div class="article-metaline"><span class="article-meta-tag">作者</span><span class="article-meta-value">bestcpbl (你怎麼能不愛棒球呢)</span></div><div class="article-metaline-right"><span class="article-meta-tag">看板</span><span class="article-meta-value">movie</span></div><div class="article-metaline"><span class="article-meta-tag">標題</span><span class="article-meta-value">[極好雷]星際大戰８ 實在是太精彩了</span></div><div class="article-metaline"><span class="article-meta-tag">時間</span><span class="article-meta-value">Fri Dec 15 21:49:46 2017</span></div>
整篇文章都有雷，請審慎閱讀








因為想要在完全沒有資訊的情況下看這一集的星戰，一直一來都故意避開預告片，看fb都
要非常小心，在不想被雷到的情況下上映第一天就衝了IMAX 3D，在這小小抱怨一下，請
散場的電影同好要討論劇情的時候不要在旁邊滿滿都是在等排隊入場的觀眾旁邊大聲討論
好嗎?在進場前聽到一句超大聲的&#34;所以Rey就是一個隨便人家的小孩喔&#34;我差點直接飆髒話


在看最後的絕地武士前我花了兩天的時間快速補完4.5.6.7，真的很慶幸有做這件事，在
看到Luke看著雙夕陽西下那邊超級有感覺，快要流淚那種。我覺得這部電影的整體表現實
在是太棒了，雖然一看就知道這是篇腦粉的文章，但是希望也有人有同樣感覺。



1.Rey跟Luke的師徒關係
Rey跟Luke在這邊的感覺跟前面絕地武士的師徒關係不太一樣，不是單純上對下在做訓練
，Luke一開始只打算在這座島上過完餘生贖罪，在R2D2犯規的請求才下決定出馬，但是
在看到Rey驚人的原力之後當年對Kylo Ren的感覺重新浮上心頭，以前絕地武士的教導中
一直強調要避開黑暗面(但是結果常常...)，不可以接觸黑暗面，但是在這裡Rey做出跟過
去的絕地武士們完全不同的選擇，她直接面對自己的黑暗面，照Luke的說法，她連嘗試避
開都沒有，可是難道Luke就一定對的嗎?後來Rey其實算是不聽Luke的話氣噗噗的離開島去
找Kylo Ren，跟當年Luke不聽Yoda的話還沒訓練完就離開洞穴去救人其實有異曲同工之妙
。



2.Luke跟Kylo Ren的師徒(舅甥)關係
第七集看完大家罵得要死的Kylo Ren，在看完第八集之後在我的心中完全得到平反，(我
知道這點見仁見智)，想像一下自己最親近的人，從小訓練自己到大的師父，居然在自己
睡覺的時候想殺我，就算只是有念頭，就算只是拿光劍還沒有真的砍下去，如果用現在
的眼光來看就是自己最親近的人在睡覺的時候拿著槍指著自己耶，我覺得Rey在大聲質疑
&#34;是你創造了Kylo Ren嗎?&#34;Luke是完全無法反駁的，再怎麼樣的原力使用者這時候都很難
不墮入黑暗。我們可以看到Kylo Ren在面對爸爸Han的掙扎和痛苦，對Leia更是完全下不
了手，但是看到Luke他是完全義無反顧要把這個人大卸八塊，畢竟是當年想要在睡夢中
了結自己的仇人。


在這裡我認人真的非常意外，雖然我知道每個人都會有自己的想法，我也沒有要改變
別人想法的意思，但是為什麼版上都對Luke的所作所為這麼無感啊?一切的錯都推給
Kylo Ren?說他殺爸爸有多不應該，說他多中二，沒有想過就是他父母把他丟給舅舅訓
練，然後在睡覺的時候發現自己差點被殺掉?對於Luke卻是親描淡寫，說他還是那個善良
的絕地武士，他還是那個星戰裡的最後的光明等等，我完全無法接受阿阿阿!在我看起來
他就是不小心走向父親的後路，黑暗面爆發才會有念頭要在自己外甥的睡夢中給他一個
乾淨，Luke根本就欠他們一家三口還有整個宇宙一個交代（看看他在最後看到Leia有多
抱歉)，在自己釀成驚天大錯後還什麼都不解釋的躲到遙遠的小島上等死？簡直是不負責
任到極點，我幾乎認為Luke是這一集的最大反派了。好在他最後在自身的醒悟和Yoda提點
之下頓悟，開外掛&#34;一個人拿著光劍對抗整個第一軍團&#34;，然後力竭而亡，真的把Luke這個
腳色的一生塑造的太讚了，上個世代最後的絕地武士在犯了不可原諒的錯誤之後，在人生
的最後關頭頓悟，有沒有一點他爸爸的既視感?Luke坐在岩石上消逝的畫面真的太淒美太悲
壯，堪稱影史最經典場面。



3.Kylo Ren和Rey的正邪
這一集把兩個人各自有的黑暗和光明面都拍得相當棒，兩個人的關係也應該會是第九集的
劇情主軸之一，兩個人各自掙扎，互相影響，相互拉扯，在一場驚人合作戰之後又走向完
全不同的道路，真是令人驚訝這兩位年輕演員的表現。



4.Luke和Leia
兄妹兩人在最後終於見面的場景真的讓人鼻酸，比第七集Han Solo和Leia夫妻相見更讓人
動容，而且對Leia來說兩次都是生離死別，再對照到現實中的Carrie Fisher過世，這裡
應該把觀眾的眼淚都吸乾了，想到永遠的反抗居首領Leia公主第九集不能再指揮反抗軍，
真的好心酸。



5.女人出頭天
已經很多人提到了這一集女人們有多偉大，對照起舊系列主要英雄Han Solo、Obi-Wan、
Anakin、Yoda(應該直接說幾乎所有的絕地武士)都是男性，這一集幾乎最帥氣的腳色都是
女性，是故意平衡回來還是因為現在盧卡斯影業的負責人是Kathleen Kennedy就不得而知
了，但是也不會特別讓人感覺到突兀。



6.Nobody
我真的太佩服這一集的安排了(因為我不知道這個功勞要給編劇還是導演還是我根本不知
道的人)，在第七集拍完全世界都已經定調Rey身世的時候，在全世界都已經猜光她的父母
有哪些可能之後，迪士尼居然告訴我們她誰都不是！(其實也還是有可能在第九集打我臉)
這一集的主要腳色Rey、Finn、Rose都沒有高貴的身分血統，一樣的，在舊傳的六部曲特別
強調的血統論在這一集完全被打破，原力就存在於自然之中，誰都有可能使用，反而是絕
地武士們把原力用得亂七八糟，走向黑暗面的不計其數。但是這些血統至上關係圖最上層
的黑武士，原名Anakin Skywalker，號稱史上最強反派的Darth Vader，他不是也算最標
準的Nobody嗎?母親Shmi Skywalker，是一名在沙漠星球塔圖因星上工作的奴隸，她在迷
地原蟲的作用下處女懷胎，標準的母親奴隸父不詳，卻擁有強大的原力，這跟Rey超像啊！
簡直是把致敬+開創新格局同時辦到並且給出一個超完美答案啊!



7.劇情的編排
這一集真的跟過往星戰劇情的編排完全走向不同的方向，以往每次都是簡單的制定計畫、
安排人員進行、計畫完美執行的公式。這一次告訴我們，並不是主要腳色制定的計畫就
是最正確的，並不是執行計畫就一定會成功，並不是正義一定會打敗邪惡，好的一方有可
能做出壞事，壞的一方也有可能做出好事。以往的反抗軍總是義無反顧的犧牲自己照亮隊
友，這次的反抗軍多了更多的人性，Leia公主在低頭看著螢幕上打叉的己方載具那邊，讓
觀眾更能感受到那些事有血有淚的反抗軍，而不是以往一台台用肉身擋子彈的戰鬥機而已
，亮眼的紫髮中將Holdo更是表達出&#34;你們這些反抗軍要能活下去才是革命能持續下去最重
要的因素&#34;。個人的英雄主義並不能成大業，而且她用光速衝破對方超級戰艦的那一幕，
相信我，整座電影院的觀眾都可以感受到那個震撼。



8.Yoda
在毫無心理準備(還好沒有被雷到）的情況下在大螢幕看到Yoda大師的英靈，真的會在電
影院不小心叫出來。



9.Finn和Rose
很多人覺得這段戲很多餘，而且對Rose的長相各種嘲弄，我個人是相當難過的，確實以
劇情關聯度來說，她們兩人跑賭場的戲似乎篇幅有點太長，但是就是因為有中間的這些
互動，讓我覺得最後的那一吻沒有很奇怪，我想很多人看到Rose的戲份就直接想著趕快
跳過吧，而沒有去注意這兩個人兩冒險當中的互動和劇情，一直聚焦在她的身材跟臉上
，她確實長相不起眼，不過這就是這一集所強調人人都可以是英雄，普通人也可能成大
事的重要精髓嗎？順帶一提帶出賭場這個場景擴大星戰的世界觀個人覺得蠻不錯的，要
不然幾乎每次都是去酒吧找人。



10.缺點
好的地方實在太多，一時也講不完，但是某些部份我也是有一些疑問。這一集開發出不
少原力的新用法，其中精彩的部份應該就是可以傳送自己的影分身到不同的地方吧！我一
開始以為是像Rey跟Kylo Ren那種一樣，需兩個人都有很強的原力，必須互相認識而且
有羈絆（第七集的雪地光劍打鬥）才能夠互相看到對方（其他人應該是看不見的），但是
片尾大戰看得出來是人人都可以看到，第一軍團的每個人都看得到Luke並且對他發射，當
下看完是覺得這個安排很讚，但是後來想想這樣打破了很多過往的設定，如果有這個能力
，那以前很多事情根本不需要親自飛一趟，絕地武士可以用這招在星球之間溝通，根本不
存在資訊傳遞的問題，要說對原力精通到一個程度才能使用也不太合理，Rey是初學者她
也可以用不是嗎？另外大家罵翻的公主突然開外掛使用原力我是覺得還好，前面舊系列就
有提到公主會用原力，我想可能是公主知道自己的原力不夠強或是沒有接受過專業的訓練
不敢亂用（太多用不好墮入黑暗面的例子）平常盡量不去使用，只有在生死交關的時候用
這麼一次。



11.一想到以後看不到Leia公主還是好傷心啊！






--
<span class="f2">※ 發信站: 批踢踢實業坊(ptt.cc), 來自: 61.224.69.156

</span></div><div class="push"><span class="f1 hl push-tag">→ </span><span class="f3 hl push-userid">VANNN       </span><span class="f3 push-content">: 女主角覺得他有救就去被,,這種邏輯，難怪絶地死的快</span><span class="push-ipdatetime"> 12/15 21:55
</span></div>你好理性，如果我是Ren發現自己要被師父殺掉，我一定已經黑暗面全面爆發把所有看到的
東西全部亂砍一通，不過這邊突然想到，這會不會是一個無解的輪迴
絕地大師可以看到一點未來的能力是大家都知道的，假設Luke看到Ren黑化的恐怖模樣想要
先解決他，但是沒有想到這個行為導致本來不一定會黑化的Ren直接黑暗面爆發，然後證明
Luke感應到的Ren黑化是正確的，但是他想殺掉他的念頭才是導致黑化的的主因？好亂啊！

</span></div><div class="push"><span class="f1 hl push-tag">→ </span><span class="f3 hl push-userid">vivera      </span><span class="f3 push-content">: 還是得說Kylo ren楚楚可憐的受傷動物樣太惹人憐愛了</span><span class="push-ipdatetime"> 12/15 22:01
</span></div><div class="push"><span class="f1 hl push-tag">→ </span><span class="f3 hl push-userid">purin3333   </span><span class="f3 push-content">: 女人出頭天好像都還沒有人提到銀兵隊長</span><span class="push-ipdatetime"> 12/15 22:06
</span></div><div class="push"><span class="hl push-tag">推 </span><span class="f3 hl push-userid">Victory2    </span><span class="f3 push-content">: 我也很能接受這一集，覺得很不錯看 XD</span><span class="push-ipdatetime"> 12/15 22:06

<script>
  (function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
  (i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
  m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
  })(window,document,'script','https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');

  ga('create', 'UA-32365737-1', {
    cookieDomain: 'ptt.cc',
    legacyCookieDomain: 'ptt.cc'
  });
  ga('send', 'pageview');
</script>


		
<script src="//ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/2.1.1/jquery.min.js"></script>
<script src="//images.ptt.cc/bbs/v2.22/bbs.js"></script>

    </body>
</html>

Traveling the website¶

In [15]:
import re

first_webpage = 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/National_Chengchi_University'
quene = [first_webpage]
history = list()

#do recursive
web_page = quene.pop(0)
history.append(web_page)
html = requests.get(web_page)
soup = BeautifulSoup(html.content)
urls = soup.findAll('a', href=re.compile("^/wiki/"))
for url in urls:
    new_webpage = 'https://en.wikipedia.org'+url['href'] 
    if new_webpage not in history:
        quene.append(new_webpage)
print (quene,history)

HTTP METHOD¶

GET vs POST¶

Get: 明信片¶

Post: 信封¶

In [16]:
#google map (get)
json_data = requests.get('https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/geocode/json?latlng=25.033493,121.564101')
print (json_data.content)

#PCHome
pc_home = requests.get('https://ecshweb.pchome.com.tw/search/v3.3/?q=notebook')
print (pc_home.content)

In [18]:
import json

pc_home_page = requests.get('https://ecshweb.pchome.com.tw/search/v3.3/all/results?q=notebook&page=1&sort=rnk/dc')
pc_home_page = json.loads(pc_home_page.content)
for prod in (pc_home_page)['prods']:
    print (prod['name'])

HP Pavilion Notebook 15-bc300TX(i5-7200U/4G/GTX950M-2GB/128GB SSD+1TB/W10/FHD)
NoteBook Modular A4 百搭筆記本 - 黑色
TRC《2018 年式 TRAVELER’S notebook》標準尺寸補充內頁 / 月間手帳
NoteBook Modular A4 百搭筆記本 - 橘色
TRC《2018 年式 TRAVELERS notebook》標準尺寸 / 週間手帳組 - 左頁週曆右頁方眼 / 駝色
【HP】Pavilion Notebook 15-au142TX 15吋筆電 英倫紅 (i5-7200U/4G/1TB/940M 2G獨顯/WIN10)
TRC《2018 年式 TRAVELERS notebook》標準尺寸補充內頁 / 週間手帳 - 左頁週曆右頁方眼
TRC《2018 年式 TRAVELERS notebook》標準尺寸 / 月間手帳組 / 駝色
Midori《MD Notebook》A5 size ‧ 5mm 方眼
TRC《2018 年式 TRAVELERS notebook》標準尺寸補充內頁 / 週間手帳 - 對開直式週曆
TRC《2018 年式 TRAVELER’S notebook》護照尺寸補充內頁 / 月間手帳
Midori《Traveler’s Notebook》標準尺寸 - 本體組 / 咖啡色
TRC《2018 年式 TRAVELER’S notebook》標準尺寸 / 月間手帳組 / 咖啡色
Midori《2018 年式 MD Notebook Diary 一期一會》A5 尺寸
Midori《Traveler’s Notebook》標準尺寸 - 本體組 / 駝色
TRC《2018 年式 TRAVELERS notebook》護照尺寸 / 月間手帳組 / 駝色

Midori《Traveler’s Notebook》標準尺寸配件 / 橡皮綁帶 / 4 入
Midori《Traveler’s Notebook》標準尺寸內頁 / 方眼
In [31]:
#high speed rail (post)
params = {'StartStation':'2f940836-cedc-41ef-8e28-c2336ac8fe68',
          'EndStation':'977abb69-413a-4ccf-a109-0272c24fd490',
          'SearchDate':'2017/12/30',
          'SearchTime':'15:00',
          'SearchWay':'DepartureInMandarin'}
r = requests.post("http://www.thsrc.com.tw/tw/TimeTable/SearchResult",data=params)
print (r.content)

<script type="text/javascript">

	function SubmitSearch() {

		var keyword = $("#searchBar").val();

		if (keyword != "") {

			$("#formWholeSiteSearch").submit();

		} else {

			alert("請輸入搜尋內容");

		}

	}

</script>

     (L)較大(M)中(S)較小(A)小，來選擇適合您的文字大小，如為IE7或Firefoxy與Chrome瀏覽器則<br />

		<script type="text/javascript">

			/*字體大小區-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

			$(document).ready(function () {

				$('.ticket_bread_right ol li').click(function () {

					$('.ticket_bread_right ol li').removeClass('current');

					$(this).addClass('current');

					switch ($(this).index()) {

						case 0:

							$('.word_size').css('font-size', '18px');

							break;

						case 1:

							$('.word_size').css('font-size', '15px');

							break;

						case 2:

							$('.word_size').css('font-size', '12px');

							break;

					}

				});

				$('.ticket_bread_right ol li').keypress(function () {

					$('.ticket_bread_right ol li').removeClass('current');

					$(this).addClass('current');

					switch ($(this).index()) {

						case 0:

							$('.word_size').css('font-size', '18px');

							break;

						case 1:

							$('.word_size').css('font-size', '15px');

							break;

						case 2:

							$('.word_size').css('font-size', '12px');

							break;

					}

				});

			});

			/*字體大小區 End-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

		</script>

	</div>

	<script>

		var bol = $("input[type=checkbox][name=DiscountType]:checked").length >= 4;

		$("input[type=checkbox][name=DiscountType]").not(":checked").attr("disabled", bol);

		$("input[type=checkbox][name=DiscountType]").click(function () {

			bol = $("input[type=checkbox][name=DiscountType]:checked").length >= 4;

			$("input[type=checkbox][name=DiscountType]").not(":checked").attr("disabled", bol);

		});

	</script>

	</fieldset>



	<input class="time_search_btn time_search_btn_tw" type="submit" value="立即查詢" title = "立即查詢"  onkeypress="QuickSearchSubmit();return false;" onclick="QuickSearchSubmit();return false;" />

</form>

<script type="text/javascript">

	$(document).ready(function () {

	

	

	});

	function QuickSearchSubmit() {

		var startStation = $("#StartStation").val();

		var endStation = $("#EndStation").val();

		var time = $("#SearchTime").val();



		if (startStation == "" || endStation == "")

			alert("請選擇出發 / 到達站");

		else if (time == "")

			alert("請選擇時間");

		else if (startStation == endStation)

			alert("起站與迄站不能設為相同");

		else

			$("#formQuickTimeTableSearch").submit();

	}

	function RestTrainSubmit(restTime, earlyOrLater) {

		$("#RestTime").val(restTime);

		$("#EarlyOrLater").val(earlyOrLater);

		QuickSearchSubmit();

	}

</script>

 <noscript>

 請選擇出發 / 到達站

 請選擇時間

 起站與迄站不能設為相同

 </noscript>

		 

		</section>

		

		

<!--time_check_right-->

<section class="time_check_right time_check_right_tw">

<h3 class="kind_ticket kind_ticket_tw">車廂票價參考</h3>

<section class="kind_ticket_list kind_ticket_list_tw">

        <table class="word_size" style="table-layout:fixed">

            

<tr><th class='c1' scope='col'>&nbsp;</th><th scope='row'>全票</th><th scope='row' style='width: 130px; white-space: nowrap;'>孩童票  敬老票愛心票價</th><th scope='row'>團體票</th><th scope='col'>9折</th><th scope='col'>8折</th></tr><tr><th class='c2' scope='col'>標準車廂</th><td>$40</td><td>$20</td><td>$35</td><td>$35</td><td>$30</td></tr><tr><th class='c3' scope='col'>商務車廂</th><td>$230</td><td>$130</td><td>$215</td><td>-</td><td>-</td></tr><tr><th class='c4' scope='col'>自由座車廂</th><td>$35</td><td>$15</td><td>-</td><td>-</td><td>-</td></tr>

        </table>

		

    </section>



<article class="search_word commonWord">

    <h4 class="word_size" title = "公告事項說明">公告事項說明</h4>

    <ul class="word_size">            

            <li title = "南港─台北、南港─板橋、台北─板橋區間恕不發售商務車廂車票及團體票。">南港─台北、南港─板橋、台北─板橋區間恕不發售商務車廂車票及團體票。</li>

            <li title = "欲得知列車停靠站詳細說明，請點選上方之車次連結。">欲得知列車停靠站詳細說明，請點選上方之車次連結。</li>

            <li title = "本系統僅提供時刻表及票價查詢功能，如欲直接訂位，請使用台灣高鐵網路訂位系統進行線上訂位及付款。">本系統僅提供時刻表及票價查詢功能，如欲直接訂位，請使用台灣高鐵網路訂位系統進行線上訂位及付款。</li>

            <li title = "本時刻表所列各次列車為開車時刻，唯於終點站為到達時刻。">本時刻表所列各次列車為開車時刻，唯於終點站為到達時刻。</li>

    </ul>

</article>

<article class="search_word2 commonWord">

    <h4 class="word_size" title = "票價優惠說明">票價優惠說明</h4>

    <ul class="word_size">

        <li title = "早鳥優惠車票，自乘車日(含)前28日起開始限量發售，最晚發售至乘車日(含)前 5 日截止。">早鳥優惠車票，自乘車日(含)前28日起開始限量發售，最晚發售至乘車日(含)前 5 日截止。</li>

        <li title = "本查詢顯示之早鳥適用優惠為該車次最低早鳥折扣。愈早訂位者，愈有機會訂得早鳥 65 折優惠車票。早鳥 65 折銷售完畢即改發售早鳥 8 折，早鳥 8 折銷售完畢即改發售早鳥 9 折，早鳥 9 折銷售完畢即提前截止並改發售原價車票。">本查詢顯示之早鳥適用優惠為該車次最低早鳥折扣。愈早訂位者，愈有機會訂得早鳥 65 折優惠車票。早鳥 65 折銷售完畢即改發售早鳥 8 折，早鳥 8 折銷售完畢即改發售早鳥 9 折，早鳥 9 折銷售完畢即提前截止並改發售原價車票。</li>

        <li title = "以上票價為折扣後之價格。">以上票價為折扣後之價格。</li>

        <li title = "以上列車時刻及票價僅供參考，資訊若有更動，以各車站現場公布為準。">以上列車時刻及票價僅供參考，資訊若有更動，以各車站現場公布為準。</li>

    </ul>

</article>

	<article class="siteMapTop"></article>

</section>

					<script type="text/javascript">

						function OrderEpaperClick(s) {

							if (s == 1)

								OrderEpaper('add', document.getElementById('epaperEmail').value);

							else

								OrderEpaper('remove', document.getElementById('epaperEmail').value);

						}

					</script>

				</form>

    var pStr = location.pathname;

    if ( pStr.indexOf("/en/") != -1 )

          'dateend':'2017/12/19',
          'COMMODITY_ID':'I5F',
          'his_year':'2016',          
          }
r = requests.post("http://www.taifex.com.tw/chinese/3/3_1_2dl.asp",data=params)

Sessions & Cookies¶

In [36]:
cookie = {'over18':'1'}
r = requests.get('https://www.ptt.cc/bbs/Gossiping/index.html',cookies=cookie)
print (r.content)

Use pandas to read html tables¶

  • ## pandas.read_html
In [37]:
from IPython.display import display
import pandas as pd
stock_id = "2451"
res = requests.get("http://tw.stock.yahoo.com/d/s/major_%s.html" % stock_id)
tables = pd.read_html(res.text)
In [38]:
display(tables[9])

In [39]:
table = tables[9]
#zip(table[:][0], table[:][1], table[:][2])
new_table = ([ [a,b,c,d] for a,b,c,d in zip(table[1:][0], table[1:][1], table[1:][2], table[1:][3]) ] + 
             [ [a,b,c,d] for a,b,c,d in zip(table[1:][4], table[1:][5], table[1:][6], table[1:][7]) ])
df = pd.DataFrame(new_table)
df.columns = ['name', 'buy', 'sell', 'oversold']
display(df)
name buy sell oversold
0 國票-敦北法人 51 0 +51
1 元大-蘆洲 30 3 +27

Example¶

https://boardgamegeek.com/browse/boardgame¶

Target¶

  • ### Board name
  • ### Url
  • ### Rating
  • ### Description # Using Sqlite to store the data
In [40]:
page = 1
r= requests.get('https://boardgamegeek.com/browse/boardgame/page/%d' % page)
print (r.content)

									                                                                            <style>
	.support-drive {
		margin-bottom: 10px;
		border: 1px solid #253260;

		margin-left: auto;
		margin-right: auto;
	}

		display: inline-block;
		background-color: #E5E5E5;

		user-select: none;

		border-radius: 3px;
	}

		opacity: .65;

<div class='support-drive'>
	<div class='support-drive-header' id="appeal" style="display: none; opacity: 0;">
		<a class='support-drive-header-toggle' onclick="DismissAppeal();">&dash;</a>

		<h2 class='support-drive-title'>
			Time Left for 2017 Support - <span id="supportcountdown"></span>
		</h2>

		<div class='support-drive-description'>
			<figure class='support-drive-testimonial'>
									<img src="https://cf.geekdo-static.com/avatars/avatar_id70827.gif"
						  width="64"
						  height="64"
						>
				
				<strong>I supported because&hellip;</strong>
				&quot;Because it is an invaluable tool and community that I use and enjoy every day. &quot;
				<figcaption>
											- Oskar Arnason (Angurvaki)
									</figcaption>
			</figure>


			Our End-of-Year Geek support drive <strong>ends in 4 days</strong>! It has been your support,
			financial and otherwise, that has allowed this site to become what it is today.
			<a href="/thread/1894300">Learn More</a>

			
		</div>
	</div>
	<div id="appeal-min" class='support-drive-header support-drive-header-minimized' style="display: none;">
		<a class='support-drive-header-toggle' onclick="OpenAppeal();">&plus;</a>
		<h2 class='support-drive-title'>Please Support The Geek!</h2>
		<a href="/thread/1894300">Learn More</a>
	</div>
	<div class='support-drive-status'>
		<div class='support-drive-status-bonus-info'>
			GeekGold Bonus for All Supporters at year's end: 1000!
		</div>
		<h3 class='support-drive-status-title'>13,677 Supporters</h3>

		<div class='support-drive-thermometer'>
			<div class='support-drive-thermometer-current' style='width: 68.4%;'></div>
		</div>

		<div class='support-drive-status-meta'>
			$15 min for supporter badge &amp; GeekGold bonus
		</div>

		<div class='support-drive-status-remainder'>
			4 Days Left
		</div>
	</div>
	<div class='support-drive-contribute'>
		<h3 class='support-drive-contribute-title'>
			Support:
		</h3>

		<form id='support-drive-form' action="https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr" method="post">
			<input type="hidden" name="cmd" value="_xclick">
			<input type="hidden" name="business" value="scott.alden@gmail.com">
			<input type="hidden" name="custom" value="Anonymous User">
			<input type="hidden" name="currency_code" value="USD">
			<input type="hidden" name="tax" value="0.00">
			<input type="hidden" name="shipping" value="0.00">
			<input type="hidden" name="no_shipping" value="1">
			<input type="hidden" name="no_note" value="1">
			<input type="hidden" name="item_name" value="Geek Support from ">
			<input type="hidden" name="item_number" value="1000">
			<input type="hidden" name="return" value="http://boardgamegeek.com/paypal-return.php">
			<input type="hidden" name="cancel_return" value="http://boardgamegeek.com/">
			<input type="hidden" name="amount" value="">
		</form>

		<form>
			<fieldset>
				<label class='support-drive-contribute-frequency'>
					<input type='radio' name='frequency' checked='checked' id="frequency_onetime" onchange="setPayCreditVisiblity()"> One-Time
				</label>
				<label class='support-drive-contribute-frequency'>
					<input type='radio' name='frequency' id="frequency_monthly" onchange="setPayCreditVisiblity()"> Monthly
				</label>
			</fieldset>
			<fieldset class='support-drive-contribute-amounts' id="support-amounts">
				<label class='btn'>
					<input type='radio' name='amount' value='5'>
					$5
				</label>
				<label class='btn active'>
					<input type='radio' name='amount' value='15'>
					$15
				</label>
				<label class='btn'>
					<input type='radio' name='amount' value='25' checked="checked">
					$25
				</label>
				<label class='btn'>
					<input type='radio' name='amount' value='50'>
					$50
				</label>
				<label class='btn'>
					<input type='radio' name='amount' value='100'>
					$100
				</label>
				<label class='btn-input' for="input_amount_other">
					<input id="input_amount_other" type="radio" value="Other" name="amount">
					<label for="input_amount_other">$</label>
					<input id='otheramount' type="text" autocomplete="off" size="3" name="amountGiven" placeholder="Other">
				</label>
				
			</fieldset>
			<fieldset>
				<input class='btn btn-primary' type='button' onclick='submitPayment();' value='Paypal'>
				<input class='btn btn-primary'
						 id='pay_credit_button'
						 type='button'
						 onclick='payCreditCard();'
						 value='Credit Card'>
			</fieldset>
		</form>
	</div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript" language="JavaScript" src="/js/countdown.min.js"></script>

<script>
	
	function clearOtherAmount() {
		$( 'otheramount' ).set( 'value', '' );
	}

	function payCreditCard() {
		var amount = getAmount();
		amount = parseInt( amount, 10 ) * 100;
		var domain = "boardgamegeek.com";
		
		window.location = "https://" + domain + '/support?supporttype=creditcard&amount=' + amount;
	}

	function setPayCreditVisiblity() {

		var aio = $( 'input_amount_other' );
		var fm = $( 'frequency_monthly' );

		if ( aio.checked || fm.checked ) {
			$( 'pay_credit_button' ).set( 'disabled', true );
		}
		else {
			$( 'pay_credit_button' ).set( 'disabled', false );
		}
	}

	function setMonthly() {
		var form = $( 'support-drive-form' );
		form.getElement( 'input[name=cmd]' ).set( 'value', '_xclick-subscriptions' );
		var username = form.getElement( 'input[name=custom]' ).get( 'value' );
		form.getElement( 'input[name=item_name]' ).set( 'value', 'Geek Monthly Support from ' + username );

		addInput( form, 't3', 'M' );
		addInput( form, 'bn', 'PP-SubscriptionsBF' );
		addInput( form, 'p3', '1' );
		addInput( form, 'src', '1' );
		addInput( form, 'sra', '1' );
		addInput( form, 'a3', form.getElement( 'input[name=amount]' ).get( 'value' ) );
	}

	function addInput( form, name, value ) {
		if ( form.getElement( 'input[name=' + name + ']' ) ) {
			form.getElement( 'input[name=' + name + ']' ).set( 'value', value );
		}
		else {
			inputEl = new Element( 'input', {'name': name, 'value': value, 'type': 'hidden'} );
			inputEl.inject( form, 'top' );
		}
	}

	function setOneTime() {
		var form = $( 'support-drive-form' );
		form.getElement( 'input[name=cmd]' ).set( 'value', '_xclick' );
		var username = form.getElement( 'input[name=custom]' ).get( 'value' );
		form.getElement( 'input[name=item_name]' ).set( 'value', 'Geek Support from ' + username );
		destroyInput( form, 't3' );
		destroyInput( form, 'bn' );
		destroyInput( form, 'p3' );
		destroyInput( form, 'src' );
		destroyInput( form, 'sra' );
		destroyInput( form, 'a3' );
	}

	function destroyInput( form, name ) {
		el = form.getElement( 'input[name=' + name + ']' );
		if ( el )
			el.destroy();
	}

	function setAmount( form ) {
		var amount = getAmount();
		form.getElement( 'input[name=amount]' ).set( 'value', amount );
	}

	function getAmount() {
		var supportdiv = $( 'support-amounts' );
		var amount = supportdiv.getElement( 'input[name=amountGiven]' ).get( 'value' );
		if ( !amount ) {
			var amountEls = supportdiv.getElements( 'input[name=amount]' );
			for ( var i = amountEls.length - 1; i >= 0; i-- ) {
				if ( amountEls[ i ].checked ) {
					amount = amountEls[ i ].get( 'value' );
				}
			}
			;
		}

		return amount;
	}

	function submitPayment() {
		var form = $( 'support-drive-form' );

		if ( form.getElement( 'input[name=custom]' ).get( 'value' ) == 'Anonymous User' )
			StickyWin.confirm( "Support", "You are not logged in. If you want to receive a supporter badge and/or adblock (depending on your support level), you should <a href='/login'>log in</a> first! Otherwise, click Ok to continue.", submitPaymentConfirm );
		else
			submitPaymentConfirm();
	}

	function submitPaymentConfirm() {
		var form = $( 'support-drive-form' );

		setAmount( form );
		if ( $( 'frequency_monthly' ).checked ) {
			setMonthly();
		}
		else {
			setOneTime();
		}

		$( 'support-drive-form' ).submit();
	}

	function DismissAppeal() {
		var app = $( 'appeal' );
		app.fade( 'out' ).get( 'tween' ).chain( function () {
			hideAppeal();
		} );
		var myCookie = Cookie.write( 'dismissappeal_v12', 1, {
			duration: 3,
			path: '/',
			domain: '.boardgamegeek.com'
		} );
	}

	function OpenAppeal() {
		showAppeal();
		var oldcookie = Cookie.dispose( 'dismissappeal_v12', {
			path: '/',
			domain: '.boardgamegeek.com'
		});
	}

	function showAppeal() {
		$( 'appeal' ).setStyle( 'display', 'block' );
		$( 'appeal-min' ).setStyle( 'display', 'none' );
		var myFx = new Fx.Tween( $( 'appeal' ), {duration: 2000} );
		myFx.start( 'opacity', 0, 1.0 );
	}

	function hideAppeal() {
		$( 'appeal' ).setStyle( 'display', 'none' );
		$( 'appeal-min' ).setStyle( 'display', 'block' );
	}

	function updateplea() {
		var myCookie = Cookie.read( 'dismissappeal_v12' );

		if ( !myCookie ) {
			showAppeal();
		} else {
			hideAppeal();
		}
	}

	function initSupport() {
		updateplea();
		initTimer();
		addSupportClickEvents();
		resetActiveAmountStyles();
	}

	function initTimer() {
		var enddate = new Date( '2018-01-01T06:00:00.000Z' );
		var now = new Date();
		if ( enddate < now ) {
			$( 'supportcountdown' ).set( 'html', "Now!" );
		}
		else {
			var timerid = countdown( function ( ts ) {
					$( 'supportcountdown' ).set( 'html', ts.toHTML( "span" ) );
				},
				enddate,
				countdown.DAYS | countdown.HOURS | countdown.MINUTES );
		}
	}

	var handleAmountClick = function( event ) {
		var otherClicked = event.target.getParent().getProperty('for') == 'input_amount_other';
		if( !otherClicked )
			clearOtherAmount();
		if( otherClicked ) {
			$( 'input_amount_other' ).set( 'checked', 1 );
		} else {
			event.target.set( 'checked', 1 );
		}
		resetActiveAmountStyles();
		setPayCreditVisiblity();
	};

	var resetActiveAmountStyles = function() {
		$$('fieldset.support-drive-contribute-amounts input[name=amount]' ).each( function( el ){
			if( el.checked )
				el.getParent().addClass( 'active' );
			else
				el.getParent().removeClass( 'active' );
		});
	};

	function addSupportClickEvents() {
		var buttons = $$('fieldset.support-drive-contribute-amounts input' ).each( function( el ){
			el.addEvent( 'click', handleAmountClick );
		});
	};

	//	window.addEvent( 'domready', initSupport );
	initSupport();
	
</script>

In [41]:
page = 1
r= requests.get('https://boardgamegeek.com/browse/boardgame/page/%d' % page)
soup = BeautifulSoup(r.content,'lxml')
tables = soup.find_all(id="row_")
print (len(tables))
print (tables[0])

In [42]:
links = list()
for table in tables:
    link = 'https://boardgamegeek.com' + table.find_all('a')[1]['href']
    links.append(link)
print (links[0])

https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/161936/pandemic-legacy-season-1
In [29]:
from selenium import webdriver

link = links[0]
driver = webdriver.PhantomJS(executable_path='./phantomjs.exe')
driver.get(link)
pageSource = driver.page_source
driver.close()  
soup_subpage = BeautifulSoup(pageSource,'lxml')
print (soup_subpage)

<meta charset="utf-8"/>
<meta content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" name="viewport"/>
<meta content="yes" name="apple-mobile-web-app-capable"/>
<meta content="IE=edge,chrome=1" http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible"/>
<title>Pandemic Legacy: Season 1 | Board Game | BoardGameGeek</title>
<link href="https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/161936/pandemic-legacy-season-1" rel="canonical"/>
<meta content="Pandemic Legacy: Season 1" name="title"/>
<meta content="Pandemic Legacy: Season 1" property="og:title"/>
<meta content="https://cf.geekdo-images.com/kFdsp5-KhTndXT3Wih9auZlUnKw=/fit-in/1200x630/pic2452831.png" property="og:image"/>
<meta content="BoardGameGeek" property="og:site_name"/>
<meta content="https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/161936/pandemic-legacy-season-1" property="og:url"/>
<meta content="website" property="og:type"/>
<meta content="Pandemic Legacy is a co-operative campaign game, with an overarching story-arc played through 12-24 sessions, depending on how well your group does at the game. At the beginning, the game starts very similar to basic Pandemic, in which your team of disease-fighting specialists races against the clock to travel around the world, treating disease hotspots while researching cures for each of four plagues before they get out of hand.

During a player's turn, they have four actions available, with which they may travel around in the world in various ways (sometimes needing to discard a card), build structures like research stations, treat diseases (removing one cube from the board; if all cubes of a color have been removed, the disease has been eradicated), trade cards with other players, or find a cure for a disease (requiring five cards of the same color to be discarded while at a research station). Each player has a unique role with special abilities to help them at these actions.

After a player has taken their actions, they draw two cards. These cards can include epidemic cards, which will place new disease cubes on the board, and can lead to an outbreak, spreading disease cubes even further. Outbreaks additionally increase the panic level of a city, making that city more expensive to travel to.

Each month in the game, you have two chances to achieve that month's objectives. If you succeed, you win and immediately move on to the next month. If you fail, you have a second chance, with more funding for beneficial event cards.

During the campaign, new rules and components will be introduced. These will sometimes require you to permanently alter the components of the game; this includes writing on cards, ripping up cards, and placing permanent stickers on components. Your characters can gain new skills, or detrimental effects. A character can even be lost entirely, at which point it's no longer available for play.

Part of the Pandemic series" property="og:description"/>
<meta content="summary_large_image" name="twitter:card"/>
<meta content="Pandemic Legacy: Season 1" name="twitter:title"/>
<meta content="https://cf.geekdo-images.com/kFdsp5-KhTndXT3Wih9auZlUnKw=/fit-in/1200x630/pic2452831.png" name="twitter:image:src"/>
<meta content="Pandemic Legacy is a co-operative campaign game, with an overarching story-arc played through 12-24 sessions, depending on how well your group does at the game. At the beginning, the game starts very similar to basic Pandemic, in which your team of disease-fighting specialists races against the clock to travel around the world, treating disease hotspots while researching cures for each of four plagues before they get out of hand.

During a player's turn, they have four actions available, with which they may travel around in the world in various ways (sometimes needing to discard a card), build structures like research stations, treat diseases (removing one cube from the board; if all cubes of a color have been removed, the disease has been eradicated), trade cards with other players, or find a cure for a disease (requiring five cards of the same color to be discarded while at a research station). Each player has a unique role with special abilities to help them at these actions.

After a player has taken their actions, they draw two cards. These cards can include epidemic cards, which will place new disease cubes on the board, and can lead to an outbreak, spreading disease cubes even further. Outbreaks additionally increase the panic level of a city, making that city more expensive to travel to.

Each month in the game, you have two chances to achieve that month's objectives. If you succeed, you win and immediately move on to the next month. If you fail, you have a second chance, with more funding for beneficial event cards.

During the campaign, new rules and components will be introduced. These will sometimes require you to permanently alter the components of the game; this includes writing on cards, ripping up cards, and placing permanent stickers on components. Your characters can gain new skills, or detrimental effects. A character can even be lost entirely, at which point it's no longer available for play.

Part of the Pandemic series" name="twitter:description"/>
<meta content="Pandemic Legacy is a co-operative campaign game, with an overarching story-arc played through 12-24 sessions, depending on how well your group does at the game. At the beginning, the game starts very similar to basic Pandemic, in which your team of disease-fighting specialists races against the clock to travel around the world, treating disease hotspots while researching cures for each of four plagues before they get out of hand.

During a player's turn, they have four actions available, with which they may travel around in the world in various ways (sometimes needing to discard a card), build structures like research stations, treat diseases (removing one cube from the board; if all cubes of a color have been removed, the disease has been eradicated), trade cards with other players, or find a cure for a disease (requiring five cards of the same color to be discarded while at a research station). Each player has a unique role with special abilities to help them at these actions.

After a player has taken their actions, they draw two cards. These cards can include epidemic cards, which will place new disease cubes on the board, and can lead to an outbreak, spreading disease cubes even further. Outbreaks additionally increase the panic level of a city, making that city more expensive to travel to.

Each month in the game, you have two chances to achieve that month's objectives. If you succeed, you win and immediately move on to the next month. If you fail, you have a second chance, with more funding for beneficial event cards.

During the campaign, new rules and components will be introduced. These will sometimes require you to permanently alter the components of the game; this includes writing on cards, ripping up cards, and placing permanent stickers on components. Your characters can gain new skills, or detrimental effects. A character can even be lost entirely, at which point it's no longer available for play.

Part of the Pandemic series" name="description"/>
